thread.title: 18 civilians killed by NATO airstrikes in Afghanistan in a week – UN probe
thread.title_full: 18 civilians killed by NATO airstrikes in Afghanistan in a week – UN probe

author: RT
title: 18 civilians killed by NATO airstrikes in Afghanistan in a week – UN probe
text:
18 civilians killed by NATO airstrikes in Afghanistan in a week – UN probe Published time: 12 Feb, 2017 18:57 A United Nations investigation has determined that at least 18 civilians have been killed by NATO airstrikes in Afghanistan over the past week. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
